message.body: What are you doing for work these days?
I was going to Jersey to work with my brother every once in a while but aside from that i am unfortunately still unemployed
How do you feel about walking dogs?
I have been walking dogs and may not be able to because I'm getting busy with my other work. I was wondering if I should suggest you if I am unable to do walks?
I like dogs, I've never walked them professionally though
It's mostly south Philly and center city. I never walked them before either, it's easy if you're a dog person.
It's usually like $11.25 per half hour walk
Because I think that they may need another person to take over some walks as I become busy over the next few weeks.
I'll suggest you if we need somebody
I think i could do that, thanks for thinking of me.
It's not much but if you like to walk its not too bad.
Yeah, its better than not doing anything which is what I'm currently doing
I'll let you know if something comes up then.
